tns:patch.author: eperez
tns:patch.description: Add a calendar in Funding Classification section

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_columns(columnid,columnName,aliasname, cellType, extractorview) values(nextval('amp_columns_seq'),'Funding Classification Date','fundingClassificationDate', 'org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.cell.DateCell','v_funding_classification_date');
